title: 22) The land bearing C
clause_text: 22) The land bearing C. S. no 831 of Mazgaon Division, known as India United Mill No 2 & 3 notified & reserved for ‘Recreation Ground cum Textile Museum” as per notification under NoTPB4312/789/CR-27/2013/UD-11 dated 29th December 2018, shall be developed in accordance with the said Notification
section: General conditions to allow development under above regulations:-
